text: hey guys it's angel
today's tip Tuesday and this week's
coming kitchen tip I'm going to share
with you how I keep my pans looking like
new now to show you how effective this
is I've got a stainless steel pot here
which we'll be cleaning today and it's
clean I've washed it with soap and water
but there's still some residual kind of
stains right here that you can see and
it's not perfectly shiny so let's try
and fix that first of all we'll want to
do is head over to our sink and get our
cleansing powder I like to use a famous
steel cleaner called bar keeper's friend
first you want to wet the surface of
your pot a little bit
then sprinkle a small amount of bar
sugar spread on top of your wet surface
scrub with a wet sponge or cloth and
after giving it a good scrub rinse with
water and feel free to add more bar
keeper's friend if needed I also like to
give it another wash with possibly water
and then wipe your pan dry see so much
cleaner just like new so this is how I
keep my pots and pans looking sparkling
new now if you guys have stainless steel
pots and pads at home
I'm looking kinda sad and maybe need a
little bit of love definitely try this
quick and easy tip I hope you guys
enjoyed today's tip Tuesday don't forget
to give me a thumbs up and I will see
you guys next time bye
